title: WHIG Coordinates Post-Vote Intelligence Suppression Campaign
description: Following the successful Iraq authorization vote, WHIG coordinates a campaign to suppress any contradictory intelligence that might undermine the war narrative. This includes pressuring intelligence agencies to suppress dissenting analysis and intimidating potential whistleblowers within the intelligence community.
significance: Demonstrates ongoing commitment to maintaining fabricated narrative even after achieving legislative goals, showing systematic corruption extends beyond specific policy objectives.
